name: Plotonium Explosive Smasher DX: Machine Slayer - Oh Yes! Edition
name_original: Plotonium Explosive Smasher DX: Machine Slayer - Oh Yes! Edition
description:
Important: The Boss rush mode is broken, please don't play it until we fix it. You can fight the bosses in the main story.

Game Description:

Plotonium Explosive Smasher DX: Machine Slayer - Oh yes! Edition is a run n' gun game  about a 16 years old engineer called Machetonio and his mecha ATLAS searching for special elements in dangerous places and defeating an evil organization called WAPO. Fight with strong enemies and destroy them with different types of weapons. Dash, jump and propulse  through the map.

Controls:

  • WASD: Moving.
  • Space: Jump. Holding space in the air will propulse you.
    • If you hold S, your position will be fixed.
  • J: Melee attack.
  • K: Ranged attack.
    • With WASD you can change the direction of the attacks.
  • L: Dash.
  • Esc: Pause.
  • 0: Fast section restart.

Special message from the developers:

Hi. This is the latest project of Badlife Games. We joined the jam three days after it started, so probably the game needs to fix some bugs and details, but we gave all our effort making this, trying to make the best of it possible. Don't forget to leave a comment with feedback, we want to learn more with this experience. See you soon!
